item.title: CVE-2023-34059|2023-10-27T04:53:31.893Z -- n%2Fa -- open-vm-tools
item.description: open-vm-tools contains a file descriptor hijack vulnerability in the vmware-user-suid-wrapper.Â A malicious actor with non-root privileges may be able to hijack the /dev/uinput file descriptor allowing them to simulate user inputs.
